General.Name: IDI Insurance Company Ltd
General.Description: I.D.I. Insurance Company Ltd. provides insurance products and services to individuals and corporate customers in Israel. The company operates through General Insurance, Health, and Life Insurance and Long-Term Savings segments. It offers death, disability, and other insurance, as well as long-term savings. The company also provides insurance for medical expense, personal accidents, serious illnesses, and travel. In addition, it offers vehicle liability and property insurance, as well as home and mortgage insurance. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Petah Tikva, Israel.

8.Name: Ms. Tal  Friel-Mann
8.Title: VP of Legal Advice & Company Sec.
